name: Page of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents a young man or woman with a fiery, enthusiastic demeanor, likely born a Cancer, Leo, or Virgo, who wants to start a new relationship with you

light: Being a cheerleader or ardent advocate for your cause
shadow: Basing your entire self-image on what others think
Seizing every new idea that comes your way without question
Habitually discounting input or feedback from others
Being so eager to "do it yourself" that you hinder your own progress

Questions to Ask: How easily do you admit your own inexperience?
How can you be a better student or employee?
What qualities would make a total beginner's voyage of discovery easier?
